name: bomber-un
description:
Bomber-un - a game in which you want to blow up stone blocks with extreme caution! Because you have a certain quantity of explosive by means of which you will blow up blocks. Also, you will encounter difficulties, because the game locations will be Kim Jong-UN, you can not let them suffer from explosions! Metal blocks can not break through conventional explosives, for this purpose requires an atomic bomb developed by Kim Jong-UN!

Game features:
- The opportunity to be an explosive
- Test the atomic bomb which was created by Kim Jong-UN
- Improve your logic .
- Get achievements!
